name: AWS Config
short: A service to monitor, audit, and evaluate your AWS resource configurations.
description: AWS Config is a service that tracks and records AWS resource configurations, providing insight into changes, compliance, or security issues. It records configuration changes to resources like EC2 instances, IAM users, and S3 buckets. It provides detailed reports and can trigger alarms when critical changes occur. It integrates with other AWS services like CloudTrail, SNS, and CloudWatch Events, to ensure a comprehensive and secure monitoring system. AWS Config is a powerful tool for auditing, governance, and security.
